translation: Then, Arjuna, filled with wonder and his hair standing on end, bowed his head to the God and spoke with palms joined.
commentary: 11.14 Then then? He he? filled with wonder? Happy hair with hair standing on end? Dhananjaya: Arjuna? prostrate having prostrated? Shirsa with (his) head? Devam the God? grateful with joined palms? Unspoken spoke.Commentary Tatah Then? having seen the Cosmic Form.Arjuna joined his palms in order to do prostration to the Cosmic Form. Had the great hero attained true humility which the bowed head and joined palms represented? and which is the essential ingredient of devotion.
